name: The Forger
description:
The forger is a crafting game where you have to collect resources such as wood and iron and forge weapons to gain military power. It helps you to defeat enemies in the game. The game starts in medieval times and a fictional world full of monsters. You have to forge as many weapons as possible and try to defeat all monsters. The game has various puzzles and other activities.

Resources in the game are:
-Wood
-Iron
-Gold
-Gems
-Military Power

In the game, there is a total of 50 different weapons you can forge.
You forge them randomly, but each weapon has its own forge success rate.
-common
-rare
-very rare
-super rare

To win the game you have to complete all challenges.
